comments:
The new version 3.2RC1 doesn't start correctly. After displaying the splashscreen for a few seconds an errorbox occors with the follwing text:

An error has occurred. See the log file
/home/hst/.eclipse/org.eclipse.platform_3.1.0/configuration/1145090807718.log.
After confirming the box the start is aborted.
